comment._content:
Such an evocative romantic image of a vintage California garden amongst the old Oaks.  Thank you for posting this one, and Arcady.

Please consider posting more than just four from 'west of the Rockies' (especially of innovative 1920's design in California.  There are more gems of these in the GCA-SIRIS collection.)
